'''1.20 Pre-release 4''' (known as '''1.20-pre4''' in the launcher) is the fourth pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.20]], released on May 19, 2023,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-20-pre-release-2|Minecraft 1.20 Pre-Release 4|May 19, 2023}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.20 Pre-release 4|otherissuescount=1
|;previous
|262760|The multiplayer selection screen turns blank after attempting to add a server and then canceling the process.
}}
'''Other'''
* Fixed a crash in the Multiplayer screen introduced in the last pre-release.</onlyinclude>
